name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Yume no Owari ni
overview: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Yume no Owari ni (探偵 神宮寺三郎 夢の終わりに) is a Point&Click-Adventure published and developed by Data East for the Sega Saturn. It is the sequel to Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Mikan no Report. Jingūji is tormented by hideous dreams of his past. The mystery begins as Yoko unwittingly decides to investigate a requested case.
